key.name: What do you need?
I'm $map:02000001$'s best blacksmith.
If you need equipment, come on by and take a look.
I can be quite scary when I'm angry.
Can I help you?
I wonder if $npcName:11000170[gender:0]$ feels the same way about $npcName:11000174[gender:1]$.
With the levee in place, business was booming, but not anymore...
When traveling, potions are a must.
Welcome. How can I help you?
If I were ten years younger, a new job would be no problem.
Need a safe place for your items and mesos?
Goldus Bank offers the security you need!
What brings you here?
This forest is way too dangerous.
Maybe I should just sell everything here and turn back.
Can I help you?
If you've got things to sell, see me.
I'll pay fair prices if your items are in good condition.
I should head back to $map:02000062$.
There's no place better for business than $map:02000062$.
What is it?
I manage every piece of equipment in $map:02000051$.
I don't want to see any sticky fingers, now.
Come here and take a look.
What brings you here?
Welcome! I've got just the thing for you!
You can run into enemies anytime, anywhere!
As they say, "Prevention is the best medicine."
Can I help you?
My potions are lovingly handcrafted by fairies.
Every potion is as tasty as it looks!
Is there something you're looking for?
Can I help you?
I searched every island I could find for the best products available!
I thought I'd make a fortune with them in $map:02000001$, but I guess it wasn't meant to be.
I can't believe the road was destroyed!
There's no place better for business than $map:02000062$.
Have we met before? In $map:63000001$ perhaps?
I should go back to $map:63000001$.
How may I help you?
I buy anything and everything, and always at very reasonable prices!
I'll buy anything and everything from you, no questions asked!
What seems to be the problem?
What seems to be the problem?
I've got so many great products.
No one knows materials better than I!
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Welcome. How can I help you?
Store valuables in your safe whenever possible.
Visitors keep pouring in, but the road is unpassable.
Need a place to stash extra items and mesos? Look no further than Goldus Bank!
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
Isn't there some kind of cure-all for my brother?
What seems to be the problem?
What seems to be the problem?
Can I help you?
I'd like to get flowers too.
I'm the famed Wildflower of $map:02000100$!
What seems to be the problem?
Buy my weapons, and I'll teach you how to use them!
If you brandish a weapon, focus on only that.
Can I help you?
Have an ice cold bottle of potion!
I'm not worried. My sister can fend for herself.
How may I help you?
Only skilled adventurers have earned the right to use good equipment.
The militia finds me indispensable.
How may I help you?
I stock all kinds of useful supplies.
I never sell things on credit, even to my oldest regular.
How may I help you?
Helping others is a wonderful thing.
How may I help you?
Plants will liven up your house.
I wish I could sleep more peacefully.
How may I help you?
How may I help you?
Can I help you?
Stock up on potions for your adventures!
I wonder why my brother hasn't replied to my letter yet.
Welcome. How can I help you?
Need a safe place for your items and mesos?
Please let me know if you decide to use the safe.
Welcome. How can I help you?
Goldus Bank is the best place for your assets.
Need to store your items or mesos? I can help!
We can hold your valuables for you.
Welcome. How can I help you?
Got heavy items? I can store those for you.
Do as you please.
Welcome. How can I help you?
It's already time for my medicine.
Goldus Bank is the safest place in this world.
What brings you?
Would you like enchanted equipment?
Want to get there quickly?
How may I help you?
Pretty homes are nice to live in.
Welcome. What brings you?
Everyone needs a place to call home.
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
How may I help you?
I dream of developing tall buildings or landmark packages.
How may I help you?
I'm going to be rich, no matter what it takes!
I'll speed you along your way.
How may I help you?
I've got new inventory!
I wish no one had to starve.
How may I help you?
You won't find better goods than this anywhere else.
The word "loss" is not in my dictionary.
What is it?
Are you here for my wares or my sparkling personality?
Hm, maybe I should have worn a different outfit.
Welcome home!
My mounts are well-trained and safe to ride.
Sorry, no test-driving.
These guys are perfectly tame.
You can buy Souvenirs in Furnish inside your house.
Ahhh, what a wonderful world this is!
Can I help you?
Please don't ask about my past.
Can I help you?
Spooky houses are kind of charming, really.
How would you like to create a haunted house?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
I shall reclaim my empire!
How may I help you?
How may I help you?
Can I help you?
Let's see...
How may I help you?
I have the best reputation for safe, fast mounts!
Who made the Shepherd Boy a liar?
What brings you here?
Take a look! I've trained all these mounts myself!
You think taming monsters is easy?
How may I help you?
Have a look at my adorable mounts!
If you want to take a look, you'll have to pay a fee.
What is it?
Feel that hot sun? I've got cold juice!
Why not cool down with some refreshing juice?
I made this juice according to my special recipe.
My juice is unlike anything you've ever had before.
World-renowned juice! An international sensation!
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Welcome!
Opportunities like this are rare indeed!
You must be positively starving after that workout!
My food is delicious and nutritious!
Watching games is much more fun when you cheer.
Give it a try!
Enjoy your game!
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
I sell only the finest products.
Why not chat with me for a while?
What is it?
Food made with love is always tastier!
Ah! I don't have enough money!
Welcome to Cathy Mart.
Welcome to Cathy Mart!
I'll ring you up here.
Is there something you're looking for?
Welcome to Cathy Mart.
Welcome to Cathy Mart!
I'll ring you up here.
Is there something you're looking for?
Welcome to Cathy Mart.
Welcome to Cathy Mart!
I'll ring you up here.
Is there something you're looking for?
Welcome to Cathy Mart.
Welcome to Cathy Mart!
I'll ring you up here.
Is there something you're looking for?
What brings you here?
There's never a bad time to stock up on survival supplies.
I sense a dark aura...
Turka's power grows with each passing day...
What brings you here?
There's never a bad time to stock up on survival supplies.
I sense a dark aura...
Turka's power grows with each passing day...
What brings you here?
There's never a bad time to stock up on survival supplies.

There's never a bad time to stock up on survival supplies.
I sense a dark aura...

Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
People with long tails are so... unusual.
Can I help you?
$map:02000023$-style buildings are really cool on the inside.
Can I help you?
When can I build my own house?
Can I help you?
I'm very discerning about the customers I sell to.
Wow, you look stronger than I am!
I currently only stock equipment for up to Level 30.
How may I help you?
I've got special, alchemically produced potions.
I personally guarantee no potions are more effective than mine.
How may I help you?
Take a look at my available weapons.
Don't rely too heavily on your weapon.
How may I help you?
Have a look at my wares. There's no fee for browsing.
Who knows? You may find something you like.
It's nearly time to eat!
Can I help you?
Have you heard of Goldus Bank?
Don't you know Goldus Bank?
There's no need for suspicion. We're a bank. You can trust us implicitly.
Can I help you?
My products are priceless, and I've got the best prices in town!
Don't you want to become a hero?
I've got only the best mounts.
What brings you here?
All things in this world are transactions of one kind or another.
You don't look like you need anything.
Can I help you?
Helping each other out is always so rewarding!
Can I help you?
I'm very discerning about the customers I sell to.
Wow, you look stronger than I am!
I just got some Level 40 equipment in stock.
Can I help you?
How do you like my hairstyle?
$npcName:11000735$'s the best.
What's wrong with those girls?
$npcName:11000735$'s the best.
They're so loud. Why do they think $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ is handsome anyway? If they saw $npcName:11000735$, they'd never look at $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ the same way again.
$MyPCName$, have you met $npcName:11000735$?
Why, of course I've met $npcName:11000735$.
Who's $npcName:11000735$?
$npcName:11000406[gender:0]$'s the best!
You mean you really have seen $npcName:11000735$? I saw her once.

It was only for a moment, but it was like seeing a brilliant shooting star shining against the darkness of the sky. In that moment, $npcName:11000735$'s wondrous image became imprinted in my mind as if it were a photograph, and I was never the same again.
Since then, it's been my dearest wish to see $npcName:11000735$ again. I've reminisced with others about her and painted dozens of pictures of her based on that single, beautiful memory.

In these paintings, I strive to encapsulate even a small part of $npcName:11000735$'s celestial charm. The reflection of her soul is like an ever-changing sky, bright as a summer's day or stormy as the darkest winter's night...

I may have only seen her once, but I know the wonder of her soul. She appears as swiftly as the wind and disappears just as soon. Fleeting as my time with her has been, I know she's the woman of my dreams!
Until the day I can profess my true love for her brilliant soul, I shall paint and expound upon her many wonders to those who would share my appreciation.
You're just like the squealing girls over there. You'll change your mind if you see $npcName:11000735$ even once.
Can I help you?
There's never a bad time to stock up on survival supplies.
I sense a dark aura...
Turka's power grows with each passing day...
Can I help you?
There's never a bad time to stock up on survival supplies.
I sense a dark aura...
Turka's power grows with each passing day...
Can I help you?
Ah, the sunlight scatters brilliantly against the white walls.
Mm, I love the feel of a cool ocean breeze!
Can I help you?
All things in this world are transactions of one kind or another.
You don't look like you need anything.
Can I help you?
All things in this world are transactions of one kind or another.

Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Turka's power grows with each passing day...
This is a fascinating world.
The finest quality demands the steepest price.
Buy or not, it makes no difference to me.
Can I help you?

Buy or not, it makes no difference to me.

This is a fascinating world.
The finest quality demands the steepest price.
Buy or not, it makes no difference to me.
What is it?
Hm? Are you here to see me?
Ah, I should've brought my Pink Ram...
There's nothing quite so refreshing as a good trip!
I refuse to be just another face in the crowd.
Welcome. How can I help you?
This is the most convenient storage available!
Need a safe place for your items and mesos?
You'll also find Goldus Bank in $map:02000216$.
We take pride in offering the best security, especially in a location like this.
Welcome. How can I help you?
Need a safe place for your items and mesos?
You can trust Goldus Bank to safeguard all of your assets.
You'll also find Goldus Bank in $map:02000203$.
Please let me know if you decide to use the safe.
Do you have business with me?
Let's see if you're qualified.
Only I can decide whether or not you can be my client.
I don't think I'll do business with you, $MyPCName$. I prefer to work with those who have $achieve:23200015$ Trophies. I apologize for any inconvenience.
Get your MapleStory 2 Fan Art Books here!
You must be here to see me.
I don't carry junk like $itemPlural:40100023$.
I only do business with those I can trust.
You've got $item:40100024$? How disappointing...
Mm? Is there something you'd like to trade?
I heard you collect $itemPlural:40100024$.
You're pretty lucky if you find $itemPlural:40100024$, but I can't help you. I'm actually out of business. If you want to buy items, you'll have to shop elsewhere.
You're out of business?!
Why does any businessman go out of business? I'm not making enough profit.
I'll either have to start selling different products or stop selling altogether...
Can I help you?
There's never a bad time to stock up on survival supplies.
I sense a dark aura...
Can I help you?
There's never a bad time to stock up on survival supplies.
I sense a dark aura...
Can I help you?
There's never a bad time to stock up on survival supplies.
I sense a dark aura...
Can I help you?
There's never a bad time to stock up on survival supplies.
I sense a dark aura...
Can I help you?
There's never a bad time to stock up on survival supplies.
I sense a dark aura...
Can I help you?
I'm very discerning about the customers I sell to.
Wow, you look stronger than I am!
I just got some Level 50 equipment in stock.
Can I help you?
There's never a bad time to stock up on survival supplies.
I sense a dark aura...
You must be here to see me.
I can never have enough $itemPlural:40100024$!
So you want to be a skilled warrior. My items can help with that.
If you have any $itemPlural:40100024$, bring them to me.
The stuff's not ready yet. Come back later.
Can I help you?
I'm very discerning about the customers I sell to.
Wow, you look stronger than I am!
I just got new stock. Come take a look!
Let's see... Mm...?
These crates are full of supplies sold by the Allicari Merchant Society.
Only those who know the true value of Trophies can appreciate the value I offer.
Trophies can be incredibly valuable, depending on their quality.
Trophies, Trophies, Trophies! I can never have enough Trophies!
What's this? What business do you have with the Trophy expert? Are you interested in Trophies?
Isn't everyone interested in Trophies?
I don't have time for useless junk like Trophies.
Ah, another Trophy connoisseur like myself! If you aspire to be an expert in Trophies like me, you'd better work hard. It'll take you a long time to become as savvy as I!
What do I get if I have a lot of Trophies?
Hmpf! Collecting Trophies is about more than just what you can get! Of course, there are precious few who collect for the sheer joy of it anymore.
In any case, I have some Trophies, and I'm always looking for more. You can never have enough Trophies, you know! If you happen to find any, I'll trade something equally valuable for them.
Do you even have something equally valuable?
Of course I do! I've got all kinds of treasures from traveling around Maple World. I can't believe you doubt me.
How dare you call my beautiful Trophies junk! Insulting my trophies is like personally insulting me, the Trophy expert! You should be ashamed of yourself for being so insulting!
All right! All right! I'm sorry! I shouldn't have called them junk.
Hmpf! I suppose I'll forgive you this time. Not everyone understands the true beauty of Trophies, after all. But don't let it happen again! Trophy experts demand respect, I tell you!
Festivals are the best!
Ugh... are these Halloween Vouchers or a trick?
Abracadabra! Time for Pumpkin Candy delight!
Looking for something? I can get you nearly anything for the right price.
Places you can get rare items are...
Hmpf! How selfish!
Feel free to browse. I've got products you can't find anywhere else.
That's a unique accent. May I ask where you're from?
Ah, you've certainly got keen ears. You're the first to notice since I arrived.
And you arrived from... ?
Nowhere you've heard of. Just a faraway place across the ocean. Actually, have you met anyone from the Allicari Merchant Society in $map:2000064$? The people who can't stop yelling yalario!
I don't think so...
Yes.
Ah, lucky you! If you do, be careful. They can be pretty heartless.
What do you mean?
They called me a stowaway and kicked me off their ship just because I couldn't afford the fare. It's not like the ship would sink just because of one extra person. How could they be so cruel?
But if you couldn't afford the fare...
Can you believe how heartless they are? You know they called me a stowaway and kicked me off their ship just because I couldn't afford the fare? They're so mean!
But if you couldn't afford the fare...
WHAT?! You're taking their side! You're as heartless as they are!
Do you have any $itemPlural:90000014$? I'll trade you some amazing fairy treasures for them!
I need a lot of $itemPlural:90000014$.
If you have $itemPlural:90000014$, please bring them to me.
There's not much to talk about. You got $itemPlural:90000014$, I've got treasures to trade. It's pretty simple, 'cause I just LOVE those fruits!
What are $itemPlural:90000014$?
Why do you need $itemPlural:90000014$?
Can you really exchange fairy treasure for $itemPlural:90000014$?
They're fruits that grow in the $map:2000350$. They also call them the Fruit of Darkness, since they grow rich off the intense darkness of the Shadow World. That's what makes 'em tasty!

Well, $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ and the guard fairies have been battling back the darkness pouring out of the $map:2000350$. Some of them got poisoned from $itemPlural:90000014$, and $npc:11000031[gender:0]$ said they need the same poison to recover.
I'm collecting $item:90000014$ extract to make antidotes from. It, uh, also happens to be super tasty... so I need a lot. A LOT.
Sure! No treasure is worth more than a life. My friends were hurt while protecting our forest, so I'll do whatever it takes to make them better!
Rudolph visited $map:2000064$ to celebrate Christmas.
What brings you?
I'd like to learn about the mysterious power the Blue Stars hold.
If you find Blue Stars, please bring them to me.
What brings you?
I'd like to learn about the mysterious power the Blue Stars hold.
If you find Blue Stars, please bring them to me.
What brings you?
I'd like to learn about the mysterious power the Red Stars hold.
If you find Red Stars, please bring them to me.
What brings you?
I'd like to learn about the mysterious power the Red Stars hold.
If you find Red Stars, please bring them to me.
Anyone can enjoy music any time!
You can play any musical instrument you want!
Anyone can compose music! Even you!
Let the music guide you! Ride the rhythm!
Anyone can play music if they have an instrument. How would you like to use one created by the Royal Music Academy to begin your musical adventure?
I'd love to learn to play music!
If you want to play music, just click an instrument. Isn't that easy? You can improvise or use music scores.
Music scores? How?

It's easy to use music scores. You can buy preset music scores or buy empty music scores and record music in them. It's a convenient method to play concerts from music you composed. Doesn't that sound like a blast?
No matter where you are, music is there! Take a look at the items I have for you, and give music a try!
Anyone can enjoy music any time!
You can play any musical instrument you want!
Anyone can compose music!
Music is life!
Anyone can play music if they have an instrument. How would you like to use one created by the Royal Music Academy to begin your musical adventure?
I'd love to learn to play music!
If you want to play music, just click an instrument. Isn't that easy? You can improvise or use music scores.
Music scores? How?

It's easy to use music scores. You can buy preset music scores or buy empty music scores and record music in them. It's a convenient method to play concerts from music you composed. Doesn't that sound like a blast?
No matter where you are, music is there! Take a look at the items I have for you, and give music a try!
What is it?
Welcome. How can I help you?
Need a safe place for your items and mesos?
Please let me know if you decide to use the safe.
I've got everything you need.
Look here!
Not there—here!
Confused?
How may I help you?
How may I help you?
What brings you here?
How may I help you look your best?
What brings you?
Want to catch big fish?
Nothing's quite as exciting as catching a big fish!
Use bait. That'll help.
Need fishing supplies?
How may I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
What seems to be the problem?
What seems to be the problem?
What seems to be the problem?
What seems to be the problem?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
How may I help you?
Welcome. How can I help you?
Need a safe place for your items and mesos?
Please let me know if you decide to use the safe.
These crates are full of supplies sold by the Allicari Merchant Society.
How may I help you look amazing?
How may I help you look amazing?
How may I help you?
How may I help you?
How may I help you?
How may I help you?
Want to catch big fish?
Nothing's quite as exciting as catching a big fish!
Use bait. That'll help.
Need fishing supplies?
What is it?
Doesn't dancing make you thirsty? Have some juice!
Doesn't playing games make you thirsty? Have some juice!
Are you here to see me?
Psst! Hey, you. I've got some good stuff here. Interested?
Just, uh... keep this to yourself, got it?
Looking for quality equipment? I've got stuff you can usually only get in dungeons. Take a look if you're interested.
What are you offering?
Where do you get all of this from?
Is it really good quality stuff?

I'm selling boxes with items from different dungeons. If you mainly explore dungeons to find good equipment, you'll definitely like what I sell. Buy from me, and you don't have to risk your neck exploring dungeons.
What exactly is in these boxes?
Beats me. They've got everything from highly valuable equipment to useless junk. What you get depends on your luck.
Oh, I nearly forgot the most important thing. Every time you open a box, your reward count for the corresponding dungeon decreases.

What a brazen way to ask for all of my trade secrets! Adventurers have all kinds of reasons to explore dungeons, like discovering the rare treasures they contain. I suppose you could call them treasure hunters, and they're good at what they do.
Naturally, some of them do business with merchants like me. Beyond that, all you need to know is that I have my own supply routes.

Good quality? What do you take me for, a cheat? I swear on my reputation as a businessman, I don't know what's inside these boxes any more than you do. If I did, you can bet I'd have priced each box according to its value.
But as you can see, I'm selling them at set low prices. It's not about my capacity for swindling. It's about your luck. So don't blame me if you do get junk from your box.
This is my home away from home.
Cities can start to feel a bit crowded, you know? Feel free to stop by anytime.
Today's the day I catch a big fish!
Welcome to a fabulous new world of fashion!
Don't you want to see Cordia's picks?
Special products are waiting just for you!
And the crown jewel of your fashion is...!
The greatest accessory of all? Personality, of course! A charming smile can save any outfit.
Welcome.
Turu tuttut!
What would you like me to make for you?
What would you like me to make for you?
Hm...
Woo hoo! Fly!
Welcome.
Can I help you?
Welcome.
This shop sells to locals only.
You don't live here, do you? This shop is locals only. Please shop elsewhere.

Welcome.
This shop sells to locals only.
You don't live here, do you? This shop is locals only. Please shop elsewhere.
Can I help you?
I'm excited for the opportunity to work with this guild!
I don't sell to just anyone.
When traveling, potions are a must.
Anyone can enjoy music any time!
You can play any musical instrument you want!
Anyone can compose music!
Let the music guide you! Ride the rhythm!
Anyone can play music if they have an instrument. How would you like to use one created by the Royal Music Academy to begin your musical adventure?
I'd love to learn to play music!
If you want to play music, just click an instrument. Isn't that easy? You can improvise or use music scores.
Music scores? How?

It's easy to use music scores. You can buy preset music scores or buy empty music scores and record music in them. It's a convenient method to play concerts from music you composed. Doesn't that sound like a blast?
No matter where you are, music is there! Take a look at the items I have for you, and give music a try!
Can I help you?
This guild house is amazing!
I procure and sell only the finest.
A powerful guild requires powerful equipment!
Can I help you?
Ah, I see my fine merchandise has drawn your gaze!
Twinkle, twinkle! Gemstones boast beauty and function!
Gemstones and powerful equipment go hand in hand!
Hello, $MyPCName$!
What does it take to be happy every day?
Join my events!
Greetings, $MyPCName$! I'm $npcName:11001003[gender:0]$. Do you want to learn more about the events we're running today?
Who's the woman standing next to you?

You mean $npcName:11001002[gender:1]$? That's my twin sister. She's also a dang good event guide, if you don't mind my saying. Whenever you're curious about any events in Maple World, we're the folks to talk to!
A special Monday deal for a special for adventurers who have $itemPlural:30000750$! What a wonderful way to start the week!
Come, come, take a look!
$itemPlural:30000750$ are given to special adventurers level 50 or higher!
Welcome to my Monday Shop! We hold special hours on—you guessed it—Mondays! If you have the $itemPlural:30000750$, I have the goods!
How do I get $itemPlural:30000750$?
Welcome to my Monday Shop! We hold special hours on—you guessed it—Mondays! If you have the $itemPlural:30000750$, I have the goods!
How do I get $itemPlural:30000750$?
Just log in during the event hours on Saturday and Sunday. If you're at least level 50, you'll get $itemPlural:30000750$ in the mail! Hoard as much as you can to spend at my Monday Shop!
Just log in on Saturday and Sunday. If you're at least level 50, you'll get $itemPlural:30000750$ in the mail! Hoard as much as you can to spend at my Monday Shop!
Nihao! Welcome, $MyPCName$!
Nihao, $MyPCName$! I am $npcName:11003559[gender:1]$ from China!
How'd you end up coming here?
Global MapleStory 2! I came to meet the Korean adventurers in celebration of MapleStory 2's launch in China! I'm glad to be able to meet Korean adventurers for Korea's biggest holiday, Chuseok!
Can I help you?
Feel the thrill of the big city in Shanghai Crazy Runners!
Win at Shanghai Crazy Runners and get Shanghai Coins!
I've got Chinese food and outfits for sale. Take a look!
What is it?
A genius scientist once said that the only way to teach others is to lead by example.
Become a mentor to new adventurers today!
I've got some great stuff for good mentors.
How may I help you?
I've got all kinds of goods to help mentees.
Why don't you say a word of thanks to your mentor?
I was a mentee once, too, you know.
Ooh... Everything here is so interesting!
How can one land be so full of wonders?
I'm hungry. Is it safe to eat the food here? I want to know how it tastes...
This place seems so peaceful. And everyone has such strange clothes! What's that person eating? I have so many questions!
...Ah! Yalario! Are you from around here? It is nice to meet you.
Yala-what-io?
You sure have a lot of questions.
Where exactly are you from?
Hehe... Yalario is a greeting in my language. It means awaited stranger! Although, the literal translation is more like "well-groomed beard."
How could I not? Visiting a new place is so exciting! I can't wait to learn more about this land and its people.
There are so many different types of people here! You must have lots of festivals and holidays of your own. I can't wait to see them!
Mm... It is a distant land. You probably haven't heard of it. We traveled a great distance by ship to get here. Our village was not at all like this Town of Queens.
Hello, hello, hello! I'm triple happy to see you!
Don't forget to laugh! Hahaha!
Where there are people, there is money to be made.
Amazing that such a glorious city can thrive here, don't you think?
To go against $npc:23000090[gender:0]$, you need <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000762$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000763$</font>.
You've held up long. Our last hope is firing the particle cannon. $MyPCName$, I leave it to you!
Since you might run into $npc:23000090[gender:0]$ on the deck, be prepared with <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000762$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000763$</font>.
Empress's blessing be with you!

I could use a nap...
I could use a nap...
My clothes are so pretty. Wanna see?
I can't leave until I sell my last outfit...
Not all Sleepy Shrooms are lazy bums!
Not all Sleepy Shrooms are lazy bums! ...But I am.
I sell all kinda neat things. Take a look.
Think anyone'd notice if I took a quick nap?
